skills.description: Researching Experimental Methods takes 1 less Action

limitations.description: Is not allowed to Publish Open Access

objectives.description: End the game with the most Tools in Hand.

skills.description: Researching Data Sets takes 1 less Action.

limitations.description: Researching Analytical Methods takes 1 more Action.

objectives.description: End the game with the most Published Research Outputs

skills.description: Can use an Action to look at the top 3 cards on the Ideas Deck and rearrange in any order.

objectives.description: End the game with the most Published Insights

skills.description: Teaching Tools to other Players takes 1 less Action.

limitations.description: Researching Experimental Methods takes 1 more Action.

objectives.description: End the game with no Tools left to Teach.

skills.description: Researching Analytical Methods takes 1 less Action.

limitations.description: Can only use Open Access Research Outputs.

objectives.description: End the game with the most Open Access Research Outputs

skills.description: Can use an Action to Publish another Players Research Output with Open Access.

limitations.description: Researching Analytical Methods take 1 more Action.

objectives.description: Ensure there are no unpublished Research Outputs at the end of the game.
End the game with at least 1 Researched Insight.

limitations.description: Can only use Open Access Research Outputs.

objectives.description: End the game with the most Researched Ideas.

skills.description: Can use 2 Actions to search the Ideas Deck for any Idea. Add it to your Hand, then reshuffle the Ideas Deck.

limitations.description: Researching any Ideas takes 1 more Action.

objectives.description: End the game with the most Researched Experimental Methods.
